{"id":1274722100,"question_id":3430,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 week, 4 days","timestamp":1717296888,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"51 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1274722100/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Count Days Without Meetings","memory":"100.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int countDays(int days, int[][] meetings) {\n        \n        Arrays.sort(meetings, (a,b)->a[0]!=b[0] ? a[0]-b[0] : a[1]-b[1]);\n        \n        \n        \n        int len =meetings.length;\n        \n        if(len==1){\n            days -= meetings[0][1]-meetings[0][0]+1;\n            return days;\n        }\n        \n        int[] prev = meetings[0];\n        \n        int cnt = 0;\n        \n        for(int i=1; i<len; i++){\n            int[] curr = meetings[i];\n            \n            if(prev[1]<curr[0]){\n                \n                cnt += prev[1]-prev[0]+1;\n                prev = curr;\n                \n            }else{\n                prev[0] = Math.min(prev[0], curr[0]);\n                prev[1] = Math.max(prev[1], curr[1]);\n            }\n            \n            // 1 3, 2 4\n        }\n        // 3 4, 2 5, 3 8, 4 8\n        // 3 8 \n        cnt += prev[1]-prev[0]+1;\n        \n        return days-cnt;\n        \n        \n        // 14\n// [,\n        \n       // 1 3,  3 9, [3,13] 5 8, 5 10, 6 11, 8 9,  ,,[7,13],[8,13],[11,13]\n          \n      // \n    //.  \n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"count-days-without-meetings","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
